text: Product Characteristics in International Economics — Role and Impact on Economic Development. Contributions to Economics, Springer, Cham, Schweiz, ISBN 978-3-319-76093-3, 2018.

title: Publications
text:
Articles

Openness Effects on the Rule of Law: Size and Patterns of Trade. Accepted for publication in: International Review of Law and Economics, jointly with R. Frensch and R. Horvath. Link
Converging Logics: Coopetitive Ties and Innovation in the Early Clean Transportation Industry. In Guclu Atinc (Ed.), Proceedings of the Seventy-ninth Annual Meeting of the Academy of Management, jointly with C. Doblinger & B. Soppe. Link
Indicators of Product Sophistication and Factor Intensities: Measurement Matters. Journal of Economic and Social Measurement, 42 (1): 27–65. Link
Vertical Specialization in the EU and the Causality of Trade. Applied Economics Letters, 24 (5): 329-333, jointly with B. Nguyen Thanh. Link
Product Sophistication and Spillovers from Foreign Direct Investment. The Canadian Journal of Economics, 49 (4): 1658–1684, jointly with K. Eck. Link
Calculate Travel Time and Distance with OpenStreetMap Data Using the Open Source Routing Machine (OSRM). The Stata Journal, 16 (2): 416-423, jointly with C. Rust. Link

title: Publications
text:
Software

SXPOSE2: Stata Module to Transpose String and Numeric Variable Dataset Including Variable Names and Labels. Statistical Software Components, Boston College Department of Economics, S458854. Link
SIMCADI: Stata Module to Calculate Similarity Indices for Categorical Distributions. GitHub. Link
PRODY: Stata Module to Calculate Factor Intensity and Sophistication Indicators. Statistical Software Components, Boston College Department of Economics, S458329. Link
EXPY: Stata Module to Calculate the Expy-Index as Proposed by Hausmann et al. (2007). Statistical Software Components, Boston College Department of Economics, S458328. Link
OSRMTIME: Stata Module to Calculate Travel Time and Distance with OpenStreetMap Data Using the Open Source Routing Machine (OSRM), jointly with C. Rust. GitHub. Link







Please find all osrmtime related files here: https://github.com/christophrust/osrmtime

title: Publications
text:
Discussion Papers

Political Economy of Labour Market Institutions in a Globalised Era. IZA Discussion Paper Series No. 14121, 2021, jointly with S. Bhaumik and R. Frensch. Link
Labor Market Rigidities, Factor Intensities, and World Trade at the Goods Level. 2019, available at SSRN: Link
Ostracism in Alliances of Teams and Individuals: Voting, Exclusion, Contribution, and Earnings. IAAEU Discussion Papers in Economics, Institute of Labour Law and Industrial Relations in the European Union (IAAEU), No. 01/2019, jointly with S. Städter & J. Model. Link
Trade Patterns and Endogenous Institutions: Global Evidence. IOS Working Paper, 358: 1-37, 2016, jointly with R. Frensch & R. Horvath. Link
simcadi: Similarity Indices for Categorical Distributions. 2016, available at SSRN. Link
Wage Inequality and International Trade: Micro Data Evidence for 22 European Countries. Jean Monnet Information and Research: Variety of Institutional Settings and Socio-Economic Inequalities in the Process of European Integration (INEQ), INEQ Working Paper Series, 8, 2014, jointly with C. Perugini & F. Pompei. Link
Der Erfolg von Flexicurity. OEI Working Paper, 277: 1-51, 2009. Link

title: Publications
text:

Articles

title: Contact
text:
Contact
Office: 4e OG-3

Github: https://github.com/hubchev

title: Contact
text:
Meet me (online)
Schedule an online appointment with me using this booking tool. The appointment will be set up on Microsoft Teams, and I’ll receive automatic notifications, including any cancellations. If that doesn’t work, or if you have something urgent, please write an email.

title: Home
text:
I am Stephan Huber, a father of four, and a Professor of International Economics and Data Science at the Hochschule Fresenius in Cologne. On this private homepage, I share files and links. Here is my publication list and here is the PDF of my CV.
If you encounter any bugs or have any feedback, please feel free to contact me:
    
Using this booking tool you can book an appointment with me. The tool will be set up a MS Teams meeting, and I’ll receive automatic notifications, including any cancellations.
